question: How can you change the JVM settings for the command line client in Gradle?

question: What happens when the Gradle Daemon is deactivated?

options.A: The client VM will always use the same settings as the build VM
options.B: The build process will fail due to lack of resources
options.C: The client VM will not be able to run any tasks
options.D: The build will run in a single JVM instance
